item.title: How can i?
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

[quote=“playerAction, post:21, topic:278289”][quote author=Jessekinss link=topic=367285.msg2783585#msg2783585 date=1242333104]

You’re pretty stupid if you can’t understand “you follow me around everywhere”.

I know what it means; I just don’t see how it applies to this situation.

Has anyone ever told you, you’re annoying as hell? You know exactly what I’m talking about so just drop the charade and stop following me around.
[/quote]

Stop flattering yourself- I’m not following you around, dumbass.[/quote]

Flattering myself? Really? Lol.
You ever heard of something called “kids say the darnedest things”? Apply yourself to that.

item.title: How can i?
item.dc:creator: @playerAction playerAction
item.description:
@playerAction wrote:

[quote=“Jessekinss, post:16, topic:278289”][quote author=playerAction link=topic=367285.msg2783405#msg2783405 date=1242317757]

Tewl is not a bad guy, it just sucks what he does to other servers. He’s actually pretty fun to talk to if you actually know him.
Most of you are judging him by his rep, and his rep is nothing like his personality.

Anyone can be “fun to talk to” on MSN. Personalities can easily be faked in text-based chat.

Yeah because vent was never invented.

Also stop following me around, you’re like a 2 year old child looking for his mom.

Following you around? How so?
[/quote]

It’s pretty self-explanatory.[/quote]

No, it isn’t.

item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:4, topic:278290”]Lol why did you bring up tewl? Who the hell cares about him.
And who cares about the staff.

google.com is shitty now since stork isnt behind it.[/quote]

It was more corrupt when stork ran it.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i?
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:3, topic:278290”][quote author=mapu link=topic=367285.msg2782986#msg2782986 date=1242263390]
Their peice of shit servers distract people from the well developed servers.
[/quote]

Lol isnt that what ur sig is doing?[/quote]

How so?

It’s stable. It always has 30-70 players online depending on timezone. It doesn’t go down. It’s actively developed. It’s moderated well.

I don’t see how tewl would have any effect on it?

He doesn’t play, he never comes online. The only time you will ever have to converse with him is if you have auto’d and been banned. Other then that I don’t see how that would have any effect on the player?

I’m the only staff you really have to deal with. If you play by the rules you will not need to deal with admins. I believe that’s a freedom through responsibility which no other servers have.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i?

item.description:
@playerAction wrote:

mapu:

Their peice of shit servers distract people from the well developed servers.

Yeah well, most of the “well developed” servers are offline at the moment. Besides, it doesn’t take long for someone to realize if a server sucks or not. After that, they’ll go play a different (perhaps, better) server.

item.title: How can i?
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“Old Rsc Player, post:2, topic:278290”][quote author=mapu link=topic=367285.msg2782955#msg2782955 date=1242194040]

Please don’t bother bringing out a server if you don’t know how to do those very simple tasks.

Everyone is welcome to host a server, If a nooby is going to attempt to they should at least post in right section.

Actually, they are far from “welcome”. L2definition.
[/quote]

How are they “far” from welcome?[/quote]
Because they are making servers to either:

Finally be able to spawn stuffz and ban peoplez they don’t like.

They do not even posess the intelligence to post in the right section, let alone code a good, stable, unique server.

Their peice of shit servers distract people from the well developed servers.

They are far from welcome, they bring nothing new to this place. They are a hindrance.
